mapper.select: select count(*) from surveyInfo where sysdate between startdate and enddate
select sino, title, enddate from surveyInfo where sysdate between startdate and enddate
select sqno qno, sqbody body, sq_sino sino, sqgroup from surveyQuest where sq_sino = #{sino} and sqno = sqgroup order by sqgroup asc
select sqno qno, sqbody ex, exno, sq_sino sino, sqgroup from surveyQuest where sqgroup = #{qno} and sqno != sqgroup order by exno asc
mapper.insert: insert into survey(sno, smno, srv_qno) values( ( select nvl(max(sno)+1, 100001) from survey ), ( select mno from member where id = #{id} ), #{qno} )
